pr_title: Cexio streaming orderbook return an empty snapshot as first response …

timeline.message: Cexio streaming orderbook return an empty snapshot as first response #3845

timeline.bodyText: Why is this second arg an array?
timeline.author: earce

replies.bodyText: It was the result of passing a vararg parameter, inside another varargs parameter. Yes, you are right, not needed and I already pushed a change to make things easier and clearer.
replies.author: katamarano
